backend/main.mo: Backend actor implementing access control, approval workflow, user profiles, and admin‑only content management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining the Android‑inspired OKLCH color system and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the app and bootstrapping the React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app component routing users to login, pending approval, or the main app based on identity and approval status.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Guard component restricting routes to admins and redirecting non‑admins with a loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessStatus.ts: Hook fetching the caller’s approval and admin status with automatic refetching on mount and focus.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching the backend actor based on identity and invalidating dependent queries when it updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and login state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, approvals, and roles using an actor-based backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPendingScreen.t: UI for users awaiting approval, allowing name entry, profile saving, and approval requests.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface to review approvals, manage roles, and view user info with profile lookup.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Main user dashboard showing modules, announcements, and optional profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FrieslandFung: Placeholder module page with navigation and basic descriptive content.
frontend/src/pages/modules/LandVanOns.ts: React module page showing a styled placeholder screen for Land van Ons with a back button and background image.
frontend/src/pages/modules/Pottle.tsx: React module page displaying a placeholder screen for Pottle with consistent layout, navigation, and styling.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Defines the app’s route tree using TanStack Router, including home, module pages, and an admin route protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the employee app.
